divs: Sighting DetailsObject came from behind me while I was talking to someone. Object did not notice us at first.It continued in a NW direction then the object continued its path when it orbited a bright light from the side turning counter clockwise until it faced us. It continued but changed its direction. It then appeared to cloak itself as it disappeared. It reminded me of a probe like object.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Stilwell
There were no other sightings in Stilwell on or around November 2nd 2013
